rules.natural: Provided that the organization imports the substance, it exports the substance.
Either the organization imports the substance or it sells the substance.
If the organization recalls the substance, then the substance is defective.
If the organization admits the defect, then: if it is not the case that the substance being defective implies it is dangerous, the organization faces a lawsuit.
Either the organization admits the defect or the organization denies the defect.
In case the organization denies the defect, then: if the defective substance does not imply it is dangerous, the organization faces a lawsuit.
Provided that the organization is bankrupt, it is not the case that it is solvent.
Either the organization is bankrupt or the region is not contaminated.
Either the region is contaminated or: if the organization produces the substance, then it is profitable.
The organization merges with a competitor or: whenever the organization is bankrupt, it is solvent.
In case alcohol is approved, the region is not contaminated.
Under the condition that the vehicle is tested, the region is not contaminated.
Either the organization manufactures alcohol or the vehicle transports alcohol.
Whenever the vehicle transports alcohol, the vehicle is tested.
Provided that the organization complies with the regulation, then: if the organization manufactures alcohol, alcohol is approved.
If the organization violates the regulation, then: under the condition that the organization manufactures alcohol, alcohol is approved.
In case it is not true that selling the substance implies profitability, the organization recalls the substance.
Provided that the defective substance does not imply it is dangerous, the organization does not face a lawsuit.
Under the condition that it is not the case that either the organization complies with the regulation or violates the regulation, the organization is fined.
If it is not true that the organization complies with the regulation or violates the regulation, then the organization is not fined.

(A1 → G).natural: If the organization produces the substance, then the organization is profitable.

(A10 ∨ G).natural: Either the organization exports the substance or the organization is profitable.

(A11 → A10).natural: Provided that the organization imports the substance, it exports the substance.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either the organization imports the substance or it sells the substance.

(A12 → G).natural: Whenever the organization sells the substance, the organization follows as profitable.

(A13 → A14).natural: Under the condition that the organization recalls the substance, the substance is dangerous.

(A13 → A15).natural: If the organization recalls the substance, then the substance is defective.

(A15 → A14).natural: Provided that the substance is defective, it is dangerous.

(A17 → (¬(A15 → A14) → A16)).natural: If the organization admits the defect, then: if it is not the case that the substance being defective implies it is dangerous, the organization faces a lawsuit.

(A17 ∨ A18).natural: Either the organization admits the defect or the organization denies the defect.

(A18 → (¬(A15 → A14) → A16)).natural: In case the organization denies the defect, then: if the defective substance does not imply it is dangerous, the organization faces a lawsuit.

(A19 → A20).natural: Whenever the organization is bankrupt, it is solvent.

(A19 → ¬A20).natural: Provided that the organization is bankrupt, it is not the case that it is solvent.

(A19 ∨ ¬A2).natural: Either the organization is bankrupt or the region is not contaminated.

(A2 ∨ (A1 → G)).natural: Either the region is contaminated or: if the organization produces the substance, then it is profitable.

(A21 ∨ (A19 → A20)).natural: The organization merges with a competitor or: whenever the organization is bankrupt, it is solvent.

(A3 → ¬A2).natural: In case alcohol is approved, the region is not contaminated.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either alcohol is approved or the vehicle is tested.

(A4 → ¬A2).natural: Under the condition that the vehicle is tested, the region is not contaminated.

(A5 → A3).natural: If the organization manufactures alcohol, then alcohol is approved.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Either the organization manufactures alcohol or the vehicle transports alcohol.

(A6 → A4).natural: Whenever the vehicle transports alcohol, the vehicle is tested.

(A7 → (A5 → A3)).natural: Provided that the organization complies with the regulation, then: if the organization manufactures alcohol, alcohol is approved.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the organization complies with the regulation or it violates the regulation.

(A8 → (A5 → A3)).natural: If the organization violates the regulation, then: under the condition that the organization manufactures alcohol, alcohol is approved.

(¬(A12 → G) → A13).natural: In case it is not true that selling the substance implies profitability, the organization recalls the substance.

(¬(A15 → A14) → A16).natural: If the defective substance does not imply it is dangerous, then the organization faces a lawsuit.

(¬(A7 ∨ A8) → A9).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the organization complies with the regulation or violates the regulation, the organization is fined.

(¬(A7 ∨ A8) → ¬A9).natural: If it is not true that the organization complies with the regulation or violates the regulation, then the organization is not fined.
